Issue.creator: lehors
Issue.summary: Vagrant fails to launch on Windows using vagrant 1.9.3 (the latest)
Issue.description: default: Checking if box 'hyperledger/fabric-baseimage' is up to date... ==> default: Clearing any previously set forwarded ports... C:/HashiCorp/Vagrant/embedded/gems/gems/vagrant-1.9.3/lib/vagrant/util/is_port_open.rb:21:in `initialize': The requested address is not valid in its context. - connect(2) for "0.0.0.0" port 7050 (Errno::EADDRNOTAVAIL) from C:/HashiCorp/Vagrant/embedded/gems/gems/vagrant-1.9.3/lib/vagrant/util/is_port_open.rb:21:in `new' ... This is a known bug with a workaround, see http://stackoverflow.com/questions/43032321/hyperledger-fabric-end-to-end-flow-vagrant-up-in-devenv-fails >
